https://tmrev.io/movie/256188-Charlemagne 2: Piltzer 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Pip Chodorov's "Charlemagne 2: Piltzer" is a tour de force of hand-processed film which documents a Palestine piano concert. Chodorov uses flicker, negative/positive imagery, different printing techniques and colored filters to produce a film that is a true merging of sound and vision. - Frequent Small Meals Charlemagne 2: Piltzer
